branchCategory.name: AMF
branchCategory.description: <P>Series AMF odor removal filter efficiently removes odor in compressed air with an activated carbon element. The unit is designed for use in food processing, pharmaceutical,&nbsp;and brewing&nbsp;systems where odor must be removed. </P>

branchItem.name: AMF150C-550C/AMF650-850, Adsorbing Odor Removal Filter, New Style
